评论概述: They’ll DOUBLE charge you vs issuing credit
评论详情: If you order this and sadly it doesn’t fit as what I experienced… then they TOOK $ from my debit acct vs a credit….. I’m still on the phone w Amazon now

评论概述: Fitted, Long, Hide pug but accentuate curves - 5’11
评论详情: I’m 5’11” and 135 pounds. The dress was long enough to wear with my heals, there is a trail that drag beautiful. The dress is well fitted to and hide some of my curves. I have not washed but it feels like it needs to be taken to the dry cleaners.

I have never had so many compliments!! I’m 5’8, 170 pounds, and the dress is a large. This fit me perfectly. The material is so soft! The leg slit is in the perfect position. The photos doesn’t do the color justice, but it’s a beautiful dark green. I’m so happy with this purchase, and I will wear it forever!
This dress fit like a literal glove!!! Material is amazing, not thin. Everyone loved this dress, so many compliments!! Absolutely loved it

However the top lining was weirdly too big. I’m a 34DD. I had to alter it myself a few hours before the event. Worked out even with my bad sewing skills. Other than that it fit great great and looked so pretty! I read other reviews for sizing and the majority influenced my choice.

This dress looks so cheap. I bought the brown and loved it, so I decided to buy the orange for a wedding this weekend and it’s awful - I can’t wait to return it. The colour is different from the picture - it just looks so tacky. There are threads all over it from unfinished seams. Also completely see through. A total waste of money.

I needed a last minute white gown and was able to get this beauty overnight just in time! It even arrived early form the shipping time which was great for me! It fit perfect I’m small and got a small. Had an adjustable strap. It looked elegant and just like the picture. However, after taking it out of the packaging I found black , what seemed to be , ink marks on the top front and bottom I have been trying to get it out. Luckily it was too bad to notice while on camera but definitely put a damper if I chose to wear it out for a special occasion. Other than that I’d recommend!

Very cute dress it’s sliming I like the middle tummy area. I received plenty compliments at a birthday party I attended. I love the color, wish it would touch the floor is my only issue. Make sure you have the right undergarments. Overall breathable and nice fabric as well as feel.

Amazon sent this dress used with stains and pilled fabric. Obvious that someone already wore it and returned it. Disgusting - hence the 2 stars. In all the dress is decent, thicker quality of fabric, fit was snug but not overly tight. For the price it is again decent - however it does look a bit "cheap".
Was shipped a used item which is gross. Because I live in Canada I can’t return the item without having to pay high fees and I was refused any help/compensation.
The material is a slippery fabric like lingerie which o do not like Dress is not long enough - I’m 5-6 and it’s not does not reach the floor Thin material with lots of stretch just not for me

Omg let just say I loved how this dress looked one me ! I wore it to my dad’s 60th bday party and I had so many compliments on this dress , the color of the dress is very pretty I felt like a princess in this dress  ! This dress fit me so well and I ordered a medium. Will be buying again ! Thank you

It was very last minute I ordered it overnight and it came in a couple of hours. The color is pretty it’s very stretchable. The material is soft and comfortable. Fits perfectly. It’s very much worth the price and the quality is good. I was about to breath with my big belly.

评论概述: Llegaron en buen estado y rápido
评论详情: Muy buen precio y está muy elegante

I absolutely love this dress! I ordered a Small and it fits perfectly—I'm 143 lbs, 5'7", and a 34B, and the size is spot on. The color is gorgeous, and it really enhances your figure. The dress has a flattering, body-hugging fit that snatches your waist and gives you great shape. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a dress that combines style, comfort, and a bit of wow factor.
This dress was perfect! I ordered a medium & it was so comfortable. I’m ordering in 2 more colors. Zero complaints!

We had a pink Paris themed Christmas party to attend and this dress came in clutch!  The fabric is stretchy enough to be forgiving and is so incredibly soft against your skin!!! The ruching is on point and makes it very forgiving.  I have some cellulite and I was afraid it would show in the fabric on the rump, but the fabric was thick enough it didn’t!! For a bra I used the silicone circles that adhere to your skin, and I opted for no panties to avoid any lines.  I danced all night and received so many compliments!  I’ll be ordering this again in black for a different event I have!! 10/10 recommend!
Love love love this dress!!! Fit perfectly! Get it!
Just too long.

I was skeptical but this dress gave what it was supposed to give. I threw it in the dryer right before the event to get wrinkles out. The color, quality, shipping, etc…..MUST BUY! I’m 5’5 and 153lbs and bought a medium and the fit was perfect.

This dress was advertised as a Satin dress which I thought would be perfect for my annual all white staff party. I received an unflattering polyester dress instead!! I do not like it . Kindly requesting a refund. Thanks
Definitely a 10/10 it fits so good on me! I wore this to a Christmas party and I’ve got so many compliments!
Great fit super comfortable

This dress looks amazing on, it’s a must buy if you have anything formal to go to. I think I purchased a small, I’m 5’4 125-130 lbs 34ddd. Yes for my big chested ladies this dress is for us, I wore without a bra had good support for the girls
I went and tried on the dress, and noticed a stain on it. The dress itself is beautiful though

I didn’t believe that this dress would be as good as the reviews said, but it really is!! It feels amazing and is super comfortable. The only thing that initially frustrated me was the amount of room in the chest area, but once I found that the strap adjusted I was 100% happy!! I got a medium.

I wore this dress for a work holiday party and was happy to see the slit wasn’t to high. Wore again for a new years event and received so many complaints. “You look like a wrapped Christmas present” ❤️🎁

This dress is gorgeous… it fit beautifully but it was defective. There was a huge snag along the entire length of the dress because of that I have to return it. Had it not had that, I would’ve looked great. It was hard to take a picture of the defect but I think you can see it.
This dress is beautiful!  It is sleek and sexy!  The material has a little bit of give to it but still hugs your curves. I got several compliments on it
Compliments all night. 5'4 135 went with a small. Fit just right, felt comfortable in the dress, fabric was great material.
I am 5’1” and 150 lbs. medium fit my true size. The fabric was easy to steam to get the wrinkles out, and the dress understood the assignment. Very comfortable 10/10

评论概述: This is the “pink” color is off
评论详情: I wanted to share what the color looks in-person since there aren’t any real photos for this color in the reviews - so you don’t have to take a gamble. Photo looks like a salmon or dusty pink. Actual color is more on the orange side like a bright peach/apricot. If your 5’3 like me the length wasn’t too long for our height.

评论概述: Nice but not as nice as I was hoping
评论详情: It's very pretty and has good stretch but it is very thin, and the straps are a bit odd, but it works for what I need it for

Usually never post reviews but this dress is worth it! I need a formal dress for a work gala. I got an XL. I’m 5’2”, 190 lbs and the fit and length is perfect. My high heels make me about 5’4”-5’5” so the length is perfect. The slit is an appropriate length too for work events. tt has an adjustable strap too. Does not feel cheap at all. It was perfect for my boyfriend’s company party!

Did I get the same dress as everyone else? I also look at pictures before I buy an item, and no ones looked see through!  The front is extremely see through but yet the back is double lined..? Like make it make sense please. And the fabric feels extremely cheap for the amount of money that I paid for this dress. Very disappointed in the dress
Definitely worth the money. Nice and stretchy around the tummy area. I ordered a Medium. I’m 5”2 and  148lbs hopefully this helps with your purchase.

This dress was everything I needed and wanted it to be. The quality of the dress is phenomenal, it’s so soft and fits perfectly. I am 5”7 and about 160lbs and ordered a small. I wore this for the New Year and received many compliments. It’s classy yet sexy! Get it while the getting is good!!!!!

Im 5'5 145 pounds & I ordered a medium, very pretty dress I just didn't like where it ended on me, it was pretty short & ended right above my ankles. I prefer when longer dresses touch the floor a bit so if you do too, I'd keep that in mind.
Love the dress! Wish it came in one size bigger I orders the largest size they had. I weigh 230 I’m 5’2 over all tho love dress and color
I love this dress! So classy and beautiful. It fit Perfect! The quality is really good.

Fell in love with this dress! Perfect color, perfect material, perfect fit, didnt wrinkle!! I got so many compliments during a christmas party! I 100% will wear again and again! Definitely worth the price!

I am IMPRESSED. This hugged every curve imaginable. Smooth like butter lol i got compliments all day and night long. The slit on the side was a but to high for me but i still wore it and worked with it. Will order in different colors

Great dress, love the stretchiness it offers and the color is dynamic. I recommended it, think I’ll purchase a new color for next year! 🥰
Cute but DEFINITELY already used … 🤢

Bought this dress for a wedding that had a black dress code and it was perfect. I am not too big in the upper area and I did not wear a bra and you couldn’t even tell. Very lightweight and airy dress. I did get tangled in the straps when putting it on but that was user error lol otherwise a perfect dress!

Got this as a last minute option for my event as it was the only dress with same- day delivery. The dress is so comfortable and fits so nicely. The material is not see through at all. Very happy with my purchase.
Ordered this for a wedding Ended up wearing something old I had because this looked like cheap bathing suit material. Not worth even $10
Great quality, well fitting gown! Very pleased
Fit really well. Stretchy/ form fitting- a comfortable snug. Very flattering. Adjustable strap that stays put. Buying in more colors for my wardrobe.
I love this dress! It fits perfectly, just the right amount of stretch.
The color was like a yellow nude and the dress was so thin it was see through. It was so stretchy nothing sat in the right place. Quality is very cheap

Me and my husband just got married and I wanted a dress after the occasion for a dinner on an island and the dress turned out to be the perfect fit and style for the occasion! The dress fits very well, and the material is great quality ! I definitely recommend this dress!! I got many compliments on this dress
Wore this dress for my birthday and it fit so nicely! Was definitely turning heads in this dress. I’m 5’2 and 155lbs and purchased a M for a more snatched look

Loved this dress so much! I originally ordered at size S and it fit okay, but decided to exchange for a size medium! It kept rising up and became too short in length. Medium fit so perfect. I’m 5ft 4in and 130 lbs. highly recommend!
Me encantó la tela y el estilo bellísimo!! 5⭐️

I needed a dress on short notice. It came the next day. I read the reviews and went with a small and baby I was so glad I did. I got so many compliments. I didn’t get a girdle so my smile at the bottom of my belly showed but that isn’t the dresses fault.

Dress is silky, comfortable and lightweight. It’s stretchy and has some compression feel in the midsection. True silver.  Ordered a large but could’ve fit a Medium as well. I’m 5’7 around 170lbs for context with curvaceous hips.
Classy yet sexy dress, it's stretchy but in the right places. Only thing is I had to put tape on the off shoulder part to stay in place when dancing. other than that glad to have this in my closet.
Comfortable, beautiful. I’ve worn it many times

评论概述: True to size not see through
评论详情: This dress is beautiful. 5"3 150lbs after reading the reviews I decided to size down from large to medium. It fits great but I think large would have been better. It has very little stretch just enough to allow you to put it on. This dress looks expensive and has great quality.

评论概述: Wife looks stunning in this dress.
评论详情: I have purchased dozens of dresses for my wife from Amazon. This is one of the best.  The material looks great and the build quality appears very good.  The design is excellent though my wife had to look at the pictures to get it on and adjusted properly!  She got many compliments on this dress all night long.  It is true to size, flattering and worth the price.  Versatile; can be worn for many occasions.  Elegant and sexy. Hundreds of 5-star reviews.  I plan on buying in more colors.

评论概述: It’s Nice, but looks between cheap and okay
评论详情: The material is silky but it’s hard to get it ironed, looks good but I’m a little surprised that the back of the skirt has a double layer bit not the front top where is needed, you’ll need a  very good breast petals to cover your nipples because I got some from Amazon and they didn’t do anything, and I couldn’t wear the dress for what it was intended. If you don’t care to show your nipples is okay too, but I’ll definitely send it a seamstress to put another layer there.

If you are hesitant in buying this.  Do it. This dress is so comfortable, sexy and doesn't ride up at all.  It's stretchy but fits in all the right spots.  I'm 5'6" 175 pounds and I got a large. Was perfect.

评论用户: Omg wow. Such great quality and if fits my mother like a glove. The fabric is silky smooth to the touch and she said it felt really comfortable. Definitely a 10/10 Christmas gift.🫶😭
评论概述: Tried this for a Christmas present
评论详情: Great value for amount of money, straps were a little confusing at first but just follow the dress placement of the pictures provided and it was easy. Some, not all seams are serged. Amazing fabric choice.
Very disappointing as I didn’t have time to return it and get something else.

This was. Last minute purchase as the other 2 dresses I ordered for an event did not arrive in time. It was just about perfect. I’m a size 6 - 34 DD and ordered a medium. The body fit well but I did have some extra room up top but the way the straps work it makes it easy to adjust and compensate for the extra room. Great material and NOT see through! I wore black shorts under it and you couldn’t tell. Highly recommend!
Queda espectacular mido 5.2, peso 141 lbs y la talla M me quedo perfecta, lo recomiendo 110 %
This dress looked just as it should have!
Love this dress so much awesome dress for the price

The dress was beautiful! It was a good quality and pretty wrinkle resistant. The fabric wasn’t see through at all. No zipper. Very soft and prefer fit! I’m 5’2 for reference. Overall great value for your money

This dress fits like a glove. It will compliment your body and pull you in where necessary. I loved the fit because it was so comfortable!  The fabric is breathable and very flexible. I got compliments all night and the price point is better than perfect!😍

Just go ahead and buy it, I love this dress!! I felt sexy all night and the slit isn’t too high (as some reviews say). I got a large one since so many reviews recommended sizing up a bit and it did not disappoint!! For reference, I’m 5’5”, 160 lbs.
For reference, I am 4’10 and 110 pounds. This dress is absolutely gorgeous, so soft and comfortable. There is plenty of stretch to it. It’s lightweight and comfortable

评论概述: Better quality than I expected for the price
评论详情: This dress turned out better than I expected. I thought it was going to be thin and kinda see through.  It was also very soft.
New Years Eve dress

The fabric feels like silk, it’s very beautiful. I steam it to remove lines before wearing it. Perfect fit and adjust and tucks everything in just right. I was skeptical about the size because I’m 5’1 with no thighs but 36DDD breast. I ended up going with a medium to leave room for altering but the dress fit like a glove. I didn’t have to use a bra and has adjustable straps .Although the dress stretches it gives you a snatched waist. A must buy! A wore it to a 007 themed Christmas party, I wanted something classy that covered my cleavage and this met my needs.

I love the way this dress felt, it was silky smooth. I loved the way my boobs looked in it and the color was gorgeous. I tried on many dresses for my event and this was in the top 2. I ultimately ended up choosing the other dress because my butt looked better in it. It was the perfect length for me in heels but keep in mind I’m only 5 foot.  The picture does not do it justice.

评论概述: Size down for a snatcher look
评论详情: I got a large and it fit perfect! Has a lot of stretch but def feels like you have spanx under.
Perfect fit. Amazing quality.

I wore this to a Christmas party event the company I work for hosted. I received so many compliments. It’s sexy, fit well by accentuating your body and the material feels nice!  I will say when it arrived it was a little wrinkled (probably just because it was folded in the delivery bag) but I de-wrinkled on low heat in the dryer and it was perfect. I wore a strapless bra but with the back being a little low, it may show some. I’d recommend to wear a pasty bra of some kind so you don’t have to worry about your bra band or bra strap showing. Id also say, you don’t really need shape wear since the middle area of the dress has ruching to help hide your belly. If you are very front heavy and maybe have a large apron belly, then I’d wear one! If not, I think you’ll be fine without one.  I’m 5’9 and 159 lbs, 34DD and I got this in a size medium and I got this in red. It was perfect!  I recommend this if you’re looking to turn heads and give off some major sex appeal and main character energy! 💃
Perfect for a wedding or formal event
Stunning dress! Great quality and true to size.

Ordered dress for my shotgun wedding. Upon opening dress I smelled a strong fragrance, as I examined the dress I noticed it was stained. Amazon sent me a used dress. Then refused to overnight me a new dress.  Overall I think the dress is nice for many occasions.

I ordered asxa backup for an evening wedding. The dress arrived with all sort of weird oily stains. The dress itself is true to color/size and nice soft material so disappointed it arrived stained. Returning and I'll reorder. Hopefully the next dress will be intact.

This dress is AMAZING! from the quality to the fit it was definitely more than I expected. The color is super vibrate and I received so many compliments! One thing to note, you will need some type of nipple covers and under-garments that will not see through the dress. Overall, it's a good buy!
Not as described,  bathing suit material
Maybe this dress wasn’t my taste, the material was kinda thin and once I sat down it kinda tore a little.
The dress arrived dirty and used. I missed the return date due to an emergency. Would not recommend

评论概述: Tight in the bust area- but in a good way
评论详情: I’m 5”1’ and 145 lbs. 34c bra. Nice length! I opted to free the nip and go braless. I think if you do wear a bra with it you need a good strapless one. So soft, great material,  hugs in all the right places! I got a medium

I attended a black and white ball. I turned heads all night. It feels great. I danced all night. I did add padding in the bra area due to the silk material. Everything else fit perfectly. I ordered a pair of black n white stiletto heels to match. Worth the price. Great quality!
This gown fit so well and I will say it was true to size. I love the color and it felt so nice against my skin. The material quality is a 10.

评论概述: Elegant, Flattering, and Perfect for Any Special Occasion!
评论详情: This dress is absolutely stunning! The material is soft, stretchy, and has a luxurious sheen that makes it perfect for formal events or a night out. The one-shoulder design adds a touch of elegance, while the thigh-high slit gives it just the right amount of edge and allure. It hugs the body perfectly, accentuating curves in all the right places without feeling restrictive. Plus, the olive-green color is a showstopper—unique and flattering on a variety of skin tones. I felt confident, glamorous, and completely comfortable wearing this dress. Highly recommend it for anyone looking to turn heads!
This dress blew me away with how flattering it was! The material was perfect and not flimsy at all. Beautiful on and a must buy!
It was absolutely stunning and best birthday dress. Soooo many compliments. The material was not an issue accept of you drop water etc it will “stain” but other than that, I loved every moment.
Dress fit awesome and great material
Too long. Does not look like photo. Slit in side does not go as high as pictured. Purchases a small and I’m 5’3, 109lbs. Fabric is comfortable, but thinner than expected
Looks and feels like a swim suit returned immediately
